thread.title: Rivers stores drag Specialty into the red
thread.title_full: Rivers stores drag Specialty into the red

title: Rivers stores drag Specialty into the red
text:
Tue, Aug 25, 2015, 9:16 AM AEST - Australia Markets open in 44 mins. Rivers stores drag Specialty into the red AAP – 8 minutes ago Print 
Specialty Fashion Group has reported a full year loss of $4.5 million after being dragged into the red by its Rivers stores. 
Earnings before interest, tax, depreciation and amortisation declined 48 per cent to $20.3 million as Specialty, which also owns Katies, Millers and City Chic, took a $21.6 million loss from Rivers due to aggressive discounting as it clears the way for new products. 
The company reported a net profit of $12.5 million last year. 
Specialty did not declare a final dividend and said returning Rivers, which it acquired in 2013, to profitability remained a priority. @y7finance on Twitter, become a fan on Facebook AAP
